summary: This is an ENB designed to work with Project Reality.
descriptionHtml:
This is a version of \'Stakado Cinemascope ENB - Near to zero performance loss (Real setting)\'
I tweaked it for my liking & is specifically designed to work with \'Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting by JJC71\'  Check both mods out as they are amazing.

This is uploaded because of a request. I don\'t know how to make this page look amazing as other mod authors can; if someone wants to upload this file & make a beautiful page complete with magnificent fonts & glorious images, be my guest.

Instalation

Download the file manually; unzip & put in \\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim 
(Where the TESV.exe file is)

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
You need the  d3d9.dll file which can be downloaded from:http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0108.htm         
                       
Unzip the file & put the d3d9.dll file from the wrapper folder in the Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim folder.      
                    
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////


Make sure (bFloatPointRenderTarget to 0)  is changed in the Skyrimprefs.ini file which is in 
\\Users\\yourname\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim

Mods I recommend:
DYNAVISION
IMAGINATOR
PROJECT REALITY
W.A.T.E.R - Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux
Better Dynamic Snow
83Willows 101BugsHD Butterfly Dragonfly Luna-Moth Torchbug by 83Willow
ASIS
Birds Of Skyrim


IMAGINATOR settings I use:
+30 saturation.

DYNAVISION settings I use:
Static Depth Of Field + Strongest setting

I set the Brightness in the Display setting of Skyrim  12 notches from left to right (Meaning 12 notches from zero.)


Disclaimer:
I use a personal texture for rocks as I hated the grey of the vanilla; if the rocks look different in your game that\'s why

Have Fun!
author: Jimmytrouser
